original_text: In his days, Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up, and Jehoiakim became his servant for three years. Then he turned and rebelled against him.
korean_text: 여호야김 시대에 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살이 올라오매 여호야김이 삼 년간 섬기다가 돌아서 그를 배반하였더니

sentences.original_text: Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up,
and Jehoiakim became his servant for three years.
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김은 삼 년 동안 그의 신하가 되었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Then he turned and rebelled against him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그가 돌아서 그를 배반하였습니다.
